name: Unit 108 (Demo)
description:
Unit 108 is a 2D action platformer starring cyborg hero Deacon Gray. Equipped with laser sword and energy blaster, jump and shoot or hack and slash your way through levels in a not too distant future to stop a threat to all humanity. Stay tuned to Long Story Studios on our website www.longstorystudios.com or on Twitter @LongStoryStudio for more updates as development progresses!

This demo is not a full version of the game and does not represent the final product.
